remarks: The betweenness relation used in the Tarski structure for the Euclidean geometry is the same as ` Btwn ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
statement:
ebtwntg.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
ebtwntg.2 $e |- P = ( Base ` ( EEG ` N ) ) $.
ebtwntg.3 $e |- I = ( Itv ` ( EEG ` N ) ) $.
ebtwntg.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
ebtwntg.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
ebtwntg.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
ebtwntg $p |- ( ph -> ( Z Btwn <. X , Y >. <-> Z e. ( X I Y ) ) ) $.
